required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: An Open Label Study of the Effects of SHR1459 in NMOSDs Patients
clinical_study.official_title: An Open Label Phase II Clinical Trial Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of SHR1459 in Adult Patients With Neuromyelitis Optical Spectrum Disorders (NMOSDs)

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open-label study, to evaluate the efficacy and safety of SHR1459 in participants with NMOSDs.

detailed_description.textblock:
Therefore, the investigators of this study are investigating whether SHR1459 could prevent relapse of NMOSDs.
The primary objective of this study is to evaluate the effectiveness of SHR1459 in NMOSDs patients.
The secondary objectives are to determine:
The safety profile of SHR 1459 in patients with NMOSDs. Whether SHR1459 reduce MRI lesions and APQ4-Abs level.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the efficacy of SHR1459 in patients with relapsing NMOSDs
primary_outcome.description: Comparison of the annualized relapse rate at 52 weeks of treatment with the annualized recurrence rate before screening.

secondary_outcome.measure: Comparison of the annualized relapse rate at 52 weeks of treatment with the year before screening.
secondary_outcome.description: Comparison of the annualized relapse rate at 52 weeks of treatment with the year before screening.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects who are relapse-free at week 24 and 52.
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of subjects who are relapse-free at week 24 and 52.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in the expanded disability status scale (EDSS) at week 4, 12, 24, 36, and 52 compared to baseline.
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in the expanded disability status scale (EDSS) at week 4, 12, 24, 36, and 52 compared to baseline.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in low-contrast visual acuity (LCVA) score at week 4, 12, 24, 36 and 52 compared to baseline
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in low-contrast visual acuity (LCVA) score at week 4, 12, 24, 36 and 52 compared to baseline.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in cumulative active MRI lesion count at week 24 and 52 compared to baseline.
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in cumulative active MRI lesion count at week 24 and 52 compared to baseline.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in health related quality of life (HRQoL) at week 12, 24, 36 and 52 compared to baseline.
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in health related quality of life (HRQoL) at week 12, 24, 36 and 52 compared to baseline.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in pain severity score (NRS) at week 4, 12, 24, 36 and 52 compared to baseline.
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in pain severity score (NRS) at week 4, 12, 24, 36 and 52 compared to baseline.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in serum AQP4-IgG titer from baseline at 4, 12, 24, 36, 52 weeks.
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in serum AQP4-IgG titer from baseline at 4, 12, 24, 36, 52 weeks.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in the absolute value of B lymphocytes and total immunoglobulins (IgA, IgG and IgM) from baseline after 12, 24, and 52 weeks of treatment.
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in the absolute value of B lymphocytes and total immunoglobulins (IgA, IgG and IgM) from baseline after 12, 24, and 52 weeks of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: The plasma concentration of SHR1459 and its metabolite SHR1459-02 in NMOSD patients.
secondary_outcome.description: The plasma concentration of SHR1459 and its metabolite SHR1459-02 in NMOSD patients

intervention.description: Oral Tablets taken once daily for 52 weeks

facility.name: Xiangya Hospital Of Central South University
Huashan Hospital Affiliated To Fudan University
First Hospital Of Shanxi Medical University
The First Affiliated Hospital Of Zhengzhou University
